《REVOLT》
《PSYCHO-PASS Complete Original Soundtrack》 }} *「'''Out of Control'''」TV动画《[[PSYCHO-PASS]]》的第二期[[片头曲]]，由'''Nothing's Carved In Stone'''演唱。 *收录于同名单曲《'''Out of Control'''》，于2012年11月14日开始销售。 *副歌第一句歌词'''“'Cause I feel”'''无可避免的因为和风英语被[[空耳]]为{{黑幕|“狗在飞”}} {{BilibiliVideo|id=495079|page=1}} *真人PV {{BilibiliVideo|id=483887|page=1}} ==歌词== {| | {{color|#7F0000|I have copied you And made up myself So crash and splash I fight With my obsession. I feel the tension A need for caution I would like to show Cut open my skull Look into my head I don't Know why I'm so harsh I could be so brash I'm going to clash {{ruby|'Cause I feel|{{黑幕|狗在飞}}}} I can always show my everything to you If this moment was for me I try to hear Lend my ear Voices inside One link to join it all again All the things I knew The world I trusted Would be the same If I Remained inside my Protective castle And kept my eyes closed Words are just a toy That people play with It's superficial I know The proof is out there The hidden answer That someone left there {{ruby|'Cause I feel|{{黑幕|狗在飞}}}} I can always show my everything to you If this moment was for me I try to hear Lend my ear Voices inside One link to join it all If I can Go travel back in time Start it all over again Follow a calculated path to live but One day I Will come across the same Feeling again and know that it will carry over {{ruby|'Cause I feel|{{黑幕|狗在飞}}}} I can always show my everything to you If this moment was for me I try to hear Lend my ear Voices inside One link to join it all So it goes again}} | |} ==同名单曲《Out of Control》== {{Album Infobox |標題顏色=#B22222 |左欄顏色=#A1A1A1 |專輯名稱= Out of Control |image= Cover Out of Control1.jpg |圖片大小= 200px |圖片信息= 专辑封面 |原名= |出品= |封面設計= |發行= Epic Records |發行地區= 日本 |發行日期= 2013年3月6日 |系列= |專輯類型= 单曲专辑 |年表= }} *'''Nothing's Carved In Stone'''的第四张单曲。其中收录了TV动画《[[PSYCHO-PASS]]》的片头曲「'''Out of Control'''」和另外两首新歌「'''Crystal Beat'''」和「'''Raining Ash'''」。 *初回限定盘另有DVD光盘，收录「'''Out of Control'''」《PSYCHO-PASS》OP2的无演职员字幕版。 {{tracklist | headline = | all_music = | all_lyrics = | longnote_column = no | title1 = '''Out of Control''' | length1 = 4:36 | title2 = '''Crystal Beat''' | length2 = 3:59 | title3 = '''Raining Ash''' | length3 = 4:36 }} {{PSYCHO-PASS}} [[Category:心理测量者音乐]] [[分类:日本音乐作品]] [[分类:片头曲]] [[分类:Nothing's Carved In Stone歌曲]]
